Container.Name: subvault
Container.Overview:
SubVault is a self-hosted subscription management application built with Go and HTMX. Track recurring expenses, visualize spending analytics, and get renewal reminders â€” all on your own server.
Features: - Dashboard with monthly/annual spending overview - Subscription tracking with automatic logo fetching - Calendar view with iCal export - Multi-currency support (30+ currencies via ECB exchange rates) - 12 themes (6 palettes x light/dark mode) - Email and push notifications (via Shoutrrr) - REST API with key-based authentication - Data export (CSV, JSON, iCal, encrypted backup) - Internationalization (English, German)
